## DateTimeSelectorOptions interface

Defintion of datetime selector component options

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DateTimeSelectorOptions<TSelector = any, TPicker = any> extends DateTimePickerOptions<TPicker> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [DateTimePickerOptions](./datetime.datetimepickeroptions.md)<!-- -->&lt;TPicker&gt;

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [pickerCloseOnValueSelect?](./datetime.datetimeselectoroptions.pickercloseonvalueselect.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Indication whether close picker on value selection |
